Package com.mimecast.robin.assertion.client

Class MatchExternalClient

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.assertion.client.ExternalClient
com.mimecast.robin.assertion.client.MatchExternalClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImapExternalClient, LogsExternalClient, RequestExternalClient
public abstract class MatchExternalClient extends ExternalClient
Match external client.

This provides a means to match regular expressions against strings.
